pageProduct.name: Palmers Moisture Rich Night Cream 15g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Moisture Rich Night Cream helps skin to maintain its natural moisture balance while you sleep. Travel size!

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. SUNBURN ALERT: This product contains retinol. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product.

Common Uses

Containing Natural Cocoa Butter, Retinol and Antioxidant Vitamin E, this unique formula promotes softer, smoother skin overnight. Dermatologist Tested. Safe for Sensitive Skin.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Cyclohexasiloxane, Glycereth-26, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Diethylhexyl Sebacate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycerin, Tocopheryl, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Retinol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Hydrolyzed Milk Protein, Tetrasodium EDTA, Ceteareth-20, Sodium Polyacrylate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Steareth-20, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, BHT, Propylene Glycol, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin. PARABEN FREE.

Directions

After cleansing, apply to the entire face and neck area each evening. Nightly use leaves skin looking more radiant, youthful and healthy.
